more_content:
Motown legends The Temptations will head to the southernmost island of the Florida Keys this Spring for an open-air concert at the Sunset Green.

The American male vocal group with timeless hits such as “My Girl,” and “Ain’t Too Proud To Beg,” will perform live in Key West on April 5, 2020 at 7 pm.

Expect sweet harmonies and smooth choreography at this outdoor concert at the Sunset Green Event Lawn at 3820 N. Roosevelt Blvd., right next to 24 North Hotel. Doors open at 5:30 pm and the show starts at 7 pm.

Tickets are $85 -$109. Stay with us at 24 North Hotel April 5, 2020 and book a special package for reserved tickets to see The Temptations live on the Sunset Green! The deal includes a general admission ticket, a $25 gift certificate to the Blue Macaw restaurant, and a swag bag from the Rams Head Group. Reserved tickets also available.

Concert-goers are encouraged to bring chairs or blankets to lounge on the lawn and enjoy the show. No coolers or outside food and drink permitted. Tickets are available through Eventbrite.

The Sunset Green Event Lawn is a multipurpose outdoor space located at the gateway to Key West. It has been a hub of activity since its opening, hosing Grammy award-winning headliners like The Beach Boys, Rick Springfield and Michael McDonald with events ranging from a silent disco party to MMA fight nights.

What are you waiting for? Plan your Key West vacation ahead of time. 24 North Hotel is your best choice in Key West, with excellent amenities you can’t find elsewhere. An onsite Starbucks and the newly-opened Republica Bar & Lounge is located right off the lobby. Plus, the ease of our hourly shuttle service to Mallory Square makes choosing 24 North a no-brainer.

 

Read more about upcoming events at the Sunset Green Event Lawn, or read more about the space to host your unique event.
title: Motown Legends The Temptations to Play Key West in 2020
